title: The House of the Dragon
synopsi: 200 years before the events of 'Game of Thrones', the Targaryens were at the height of their power, having countless dragons at their command, but not everything lasts forever. The beginning of the end of the Targaryen dynasty.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
synopsi: After more than 30 years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is back, pushing the limits as a courageous test pilot. In the contemporary world of tech wars, Maverick takes on drones and proves that the human factor is still essential.

title: She-Hulk: Defender of Heroes
synopsi: Jennifer Walters — a lawyer specializing in cases involving superhumans — must deal with the complicated life of a single woman in her early thirties who happens to be a seven-foot super-powered hulk.

title: DC League of Superpets
synopsi: DC Super Pets follows Krypto the Superdog and Superman, inseparable friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime in Metropolis side by side. When Superman and the rest of the Justice League are kidnapped, Krypto must convince a pack of shelters - Ace the dog, PB the pot-bellied pig, Merton the turtle and Chip the squirrel - to harness his own newfound powers and help him to Rescue the Superheroes.

title: Sandman
synopsi: A wizard tries to capture Death to bargain for eternal life, however, ends up trapping his younger brother, Dream. Fearing for his safety, the mage keeps him trapped in a glass bottle for decades. After his escape, Dream, also known as Morpheus, sets out in search of his powerful lost objects.

title: Breaking Bad
synopsi: Upon learning that he has cancer, a professor starts manufacturing methamphetamine for the family's future, changing everyone's destiny.

title: Red: Growing Up is a Beast
synopsi: Thirteen-year-old Mei is experiencing the awkwardness of being a teenager with a twist – when she gets too excited, she transforms into a giant red panda.

title: The Boys
synopsi: In the plot, we know a world where superheroes are the biggest celebrities on the planet, and routinely abuse their powers instead of using them for good.

title: Paying well, what's wrong with that?
synopsi: Zack Brown (Seth Rogen) and Miriam Linky (Elizabeth Banks) have been friends for a long time, and they currently share a house and have several debts. After having the water and electricity cut off, they decide to make a home porn movie to get some money. In this way they select some friends to help them, swearing that sex will not harm the existing friendship. But when the recordings start, the business becomes something much bigger than they imagined.

title: Supernatural
synopsi: Brothers Dean and Sam scour the country for paranormal activity, fighting demons, ghosts and monsters along the way.

title: Peaky Blinders: Blood, Bets and Razors
synopsi: Thomas Shelby and his brothers return to Birmingham after serving in the British Army during World War I. The Peaky Blinders, the gang in which Thomas is a leader, control the city of Birmingham. But as Shelby's ambitions extend beyond Birmingham, he plans to build the business empire he's created and stop anyone who gets in the way.

title: Vikings
synopsi: Ragnar Lothbrok, a young man who considers himself a descendant of Odin, is a warrior, farmer and householder. Visionary and dreaming of living different adventures, he believes that the riches dreamed of by his people lie beyond the Baltic Sea. But in order to conquer them, he must convince Earl Haraldson, the leader of his people, to allow him and his warriors to travel to England.

title: Tomorrow's Express
synopsi: A group of researchers creates an experiment capable of putting an end to the threat of global warming, but their plans don't go as planned and they end up wiping out almost all life on Earth, which, in turn, turns into an ice desert. . The only survivors roam the planet aboard a train called Snowpiercer, but not everyone is resigned to the situation. With that, a revolution is about to break out.

title: Locke & Key
synopsi: After their father's murder, three brothers move with their mother to an old house where they discover magical keys that reveal powers and secrets.

title: The Witcher
synopsi: The mutant Geralt of Rivia is a monster hunter who struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more evil than wild creatures.

title: Lucifer
synopsi: Bored with life in the dark, the devil moves to Los Angeles, opens a piano bar and lends his wisdom to a murder investigator.

title: The Ranch
synopsi: Set on a Colorado ranch, The Ranch stars Ashton Kutcher as Colt, a semi-professional football player who returns from the dugout to help run the family farm with his older brother Jameson “Rooster” (Danny Masterson) and his father. Beau (Sam Elliott), whom he hasn't seen in 15 years. Debra Winger is Maggie, the mother of Colt and Rooster and the manager of the nearest town bar.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
synopsi: Brilliant, immature detective Jake Peralta must learn to play by the rules and work as a team when a demanding captain takes command of his squad.

title: How I Met Your Mother
synopsi: In the year 2030, Ted Mosby, an architect, decides to explain to his children the story of how he met their mother. It all started in 2005, when one of his friends decided to get married and Ted needed to find love.

title: John Wick: Back in the Game
synopsi: John Wick is a legendary retired hitman dealing with grief after losing the love of his life. When a gangster breaks into his house, kills his dog and steals his car, he is forced back into Action and begins his revenge.

title: Rescue
synopsi: In Bangladesh, mercenary Tyler Rake struggles to survive during his mission to rescue the son of a crime boss.

title: Shrek
synopsi: In a distant swamp lives Shrek (Mike Myers), a lonely ogre who sees his life being invaded by a series of fairy tale characters, such as three blind mice, a big and evil wolf and even three pigs. who don't have a place to live. All of them were driven from their homes by the evil Lord Farquaad (John Lithgow). Determined to regain his former tranquility, Shrek resolves to find Farquaad and makes a deal with him: all the characters will be able to return to their homes if he and his friend Donkey (Eddie Murphy) rescue a beautiful princess (Cameron Diaz), who is a prisoner of a dragon. However, when Shrek and Donkey finally manage to rescue the princess, they soon discover that their troubles are just beginning.

title: The Beast of the Sea
synopsi: A sea monster hunter's life is turned upside down after a little girl hides on his ship.

title: Moana: A Sea of ​​Adventure
synopsi: Moana Waialiki is a courageous young woman, daughter of the chief of a tribe in Oceania, coming from a long line of navigators. Wanting to find out more about her past and help her family, she decides to go in search of her ancestors, inhabitants of a mythical island that no one knows where it is. Accompanied by the legendary demigod Maui, Moana begins her journey into the open sea, where she faces terrifying sea creatures and discovers stories of the underworld.

title: Red Alert
synopsi: In the world of international crime, INTERPOL issues a Red Alert, which begins a hunt to capture the world's most notorious art thief.

title: The Predator: The Hunt
synopsi: Set in the world of the Comanche Nation in the early 1700s, 'The Predator: The Hunt' is the untold story of a highly skilled young warrior desperate to protect her people from impending danger. She pursues and ultimately confronts her prey, which turns out to be a highly evolved alien predator with a technologically advanced arsenal, resulting in a brutal and terrifying showdown between the adversaries.

title: Spider-Man: No Homecoming
synopsi: Peter Parker is unmasked and can no longer separate his normal life from the great risks of being a superhero. When he asks Doctor Strange for help, the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it really means to be Spider-Man...

title: Halo
synopsi: An epic battle takes place in the 26th century between the human race and an alien species known as the Covenant.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
synopsi: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies old and new, traverses the dangerous and mind-bending alternate realities of the Multiverse to face a mysterious new adversary.

title: News of a Kidnapping
synopsi: Early 90's, Colombia. The government tries to fight drug trafficking with extradition laws. Maruja Pachón and Beatriz Villamizar, wife and sister of Deputy Alberto Villamizar, are kidnapped by the Extraditables. The police begin a search to find clues that bring them closer to the kidnappers, and Alberto joins the operation to rescue his family.

title: The Walking Dead
synopsi: In post-apocalyptic America, a small group of survivors continues to travel in search of a new home away from the undead. Desperation for safety and supplies constantly pushes them to the brink of sanity.

title: The Simpsons
synopsi: The Simpsons live in the city of Springfield, an American city like any other. Homer works as a safety inspector at a nuclear power plant, Marge tries to keep the peace in her family, Bart is a mischievous 10-year-old boy, 8-year-old Lisa is the smart one in the family who loves to play the saxophone and is a vegetarian and little Maggie conquers everyone while she doesn't let go of her pacifier. And the series has a rich, and often strange, universe of characters that also inhabit Springfield. With clever scripts, subversive humor and playfully witty, the series makes fun of itself and everyone else who gets in its way.

title: Minions: The Origin of Gru
synopsi: The continuation of the Minions adventures, always in search of a tyrannical leader. This time, they help a Gru as a child, figuring out how to be a villain.

title: The Adam Project
synopsi: After traveling through time and accidentally ending up in 2022, fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self to save the future.

title: Don't Look Up
synopsi: Two astronomers discover a deadly comet heading towards Earth and set out on a media tour to warn humanity. But nobody seems to care much.
